name: Flippin Floppers
description:
Hi and welcome to my fish game. 

How to Play:

Green Bin- Sell fish to earn money( goal of game is to earn $1500)

Brown Bin- Keep fish (increases fish spawn rate)

Blue Bin- Release fish (guarantees that the next fish will be gigantic)

Controls:

Mouse-click and drag to move bins

*There is a bug that prevents the game from starting if you open the controls panel, just pause and un-pause the game to fix. Sorry

Notes:

-Windows version is recommended

-idk how to do music

-this is my second game
